name: Rook Autoturret
help:
Deploys a single-target battle turret which will deliver auto-attacks with a potency of 80 to its master's target. Using a weaponskill will cause turret to change targets. Hypercharge Potency: 160
Hypercharge Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 5%
Duration: 10s Shares a recast timer with Bishop Autoturret.
